name: Horde (N0vaKnight, Curruff, tehabruh, nickaronii)
description:
Base Idea!

In this chaotic city game, you are running around collecting humans to add to your Zombie Horde, with all the Zombies you have, you can mold a Horde to create a shield for the Head Zombie! Before hopping into the main game, I suggest you go check out the Tutorial to get into the swing of things! Beware though, FBI Agents have heard about the Zombie Horde and are coming to mow it down! Be sure to try to keep away from them, but if you get  close enough, you can add them to your own ranks!

Although we thought of adding a sacrificing feature, it was a bit of a scope stretch..

Controls: 

W-A-S-D: Move

That's basically it.

( if you find any bugs, please tell us!! )

Credits:

Coders: NovaKnight, Tehabruh

Artists: NovaKnight

Sound Designers: Curruff, Nickaroni

Page Design: Tehabruh, Nickaroni
